derivation: feminine participle passive of H693 (אָרַב) (as if for lurking);
outline:
1. lattice, window, sluice
  2. (CLBL) chimney (lattice opening where smoke escapes)
strongs_def: a lattice; (by implication) a window, dovecot (because of the pigeon-holes), chimney (with its apertures for smoke), sluice (with openings for water)
